segments.text: Great Britain Airline , anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , are there any planes to Paris ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on please , I will check for you . Flight GB152 takes off every day at 13
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . And I'll need an economy class open return .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Don't forget to get your ticket three days ahead .
segments.speaker: S1
